p: It is noteworthy that in several of the clinical trials described above (No. 1, 3, 5 and 6), zinc is a component of the micronutrient mixture. The role of zinc in improving the immune system in several diseases, including respiratory infections, has been previously demonstrated [ 42]. For instance, a study carried out on two groups of children, treated with either placebo or zinc, showed a lower incidence (48%) of respiratory viral infections in the children treated with the zinc supplement [ 43].
